official_title: A bill to require the deposits of all commercial banks to be insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

summary.text: Requires each commercial bank to insure its deposits with the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation. Grants any commercial bank which fails to qualify for such insurance six months in which to modify its operations in order to qualify.

titles.title: A bill to require the deposits of all commercial banks to be insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.
